In year 2000 Siemens acquired Acuson and became the biggest player in the ultrasound market with 20% market share. Over the years, Siemens has lost most of that market share. Today, Siemens is back to where it was prior to the acquisition. â–º Gaining back market share will be an uphill battle: Today, majority of the market is taken by other major players. For example, it is very common to sell an MRI and bundle it with multiple ultrasound machines. Without ultrasound, Siemens multi-modality deals could suffer. â–º Ultrasound is a big market and is growing fast: Ultrasound is the 2nd biggest imaging modality after X-ray, it is also growing faster than other imaging modalities.
